name: tm31
effect: Teaches Brick Break to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Brick Break to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Mud-Slap Gen I: Mimic)

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user attacks with a swift chop. It can also break barriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user attacks with a swift chop. It can also break barriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The target is punched with a fiery fist. This may also leave the target with a burn.
